item.title: Investors are betting these stocks will reap considerable returns in 2026
item.description: Investors shared some of their 2026 stock picks, including Adobe, Citigroup and TSMC, with CNBC's "Halftime Report" on Wednesday.

item.title: Investor Dan Niles shares his top 5 stock picks for 2026
item.description: Dan Niles listed Cisco Systems as a way for investors to "keep riding the AI wave" in 2026.

item.title: Wall Street sees a bright 2026 for this beat-up dividend-paying stock
item.description: This real estate investment trust offers a dividend yield of about 4.5%, and the company is using a capital recycling strategy that's getting attentio...

item.title: Retail investors close out one of their best years ever. How they beat Wall Street at its own game
item.description: Mom-and-pop investors bought the dip at key points, giving them outsized benefits from the market's run this year.

item.title: The market bubble heading into 2026 may not be AI. It could be this metal
item.description: Silver has gained more than 140% this year and is on pace for its best annual performance since 1979.
